Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_TaiXu
Text.Desc: Energies left behind by the power of creation from the beginning of heaven and earth. This kind of peculiar essence is very hard to find nowadays.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanTian
Text.Desc: Energies left behind by the power of creation from the beginning of heaven and earth. This kind of peculiar essence is very hard to find nowadays.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_JieMie
Text.Desc: Essence with the power of annihilation, can only be collected in a heavenly tribulation.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_JiuYang
Text.Desc: The most condensed energy in the blazing sun, very difficult to collect.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanYue
Text.Desc: The most condensed energy in the freezing moon, very difficult to collect.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_TaiYang
Text.Desc: Essence of the Sun, can only be collected at midday.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_TaiYin
Text.Desc: Essence of the Moon, can only be collected at midnight.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXJin
Text.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Metal element.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXMu
Text.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Wood element.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXShui
Text.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Water element.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXHuo
Text.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Fire element.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXTu
Text.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Earth element.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Jin
Text.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Mu
Text.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Shui
Text.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Huo
Text.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Tu
Text.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_FengShuiLing
Text.Desc: Essence that only slowly forms in places with the most exceptional Feng Shui.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_FengShuiSha
Text.Desc: Essence that only slowly forms in places with the most horrible Feng Shui.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Chun
Text.Desc: Essence that naturally forms between heaven and earth as the seasons flow, representing the energies of sprouting in spring.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Xia
Text.Desc: Essence that naturally forms between heaven and earth as the seasons flow, representing the energies of florescence in summer.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Qiu
Text.Desc: Essence that naturally forms between heaven and earth as the seasons flow, representing the energies of deterioration in autumn.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Dong
Text.Desc: Essence that naturally forms between heaven and earth as the seasons flow, representing the energies of desolation in winter.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_YongYe
Text.Desc: Mysterious essence that permeate the space between heaven and earth in the Polar Night. Their exact origin is unknown, as if do not belong to this world.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_JiaoLongYuanJing
Text.Desc: Essence that contains Flood Dragon's mystery of life, which could be a great reference for Physical Cultivators.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XiongFengYuanJing
Text.Desc: Essence that contains Phoenix's mystery of life, which could be a great reference for Physical Cultivators.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ZhuLongYuanJing
Text.Desc: Essence that contains Torch Dragon's mystery of life, which could be a great reference for Physical Cultivators.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_GuShouJingXue
Text.Desc: A drop of blood essence from the Ancient Beast, it contains the mystery of its powerful body.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_GuShouGuFen
Text.Desc: Some powder made from bones of the Ancient Beast, it contains the mystery of its powerful body.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_DaYaoYuanJing
Text.Desc: Essence inside the body of a monster with great cultivation, it may contain the secrets of Yaoguai's innately strong bodies.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv1
Text.Desc: Essence of pure vitality, it can be a great supplement to your body.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv2
Text.Desc: A wisp of the original intrinsic essence of postnatal lives.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv3
Text.Desc: Breath of life that naturally generate between heaven and earth. It is also the source of primordial lives.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_SiWang
Text.Desc: After the death of a living being, part of its intrinsic life force will diffuse into heaven and earth, while the other part will transform into this substance.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_WuHui
Text.Desc: Although the origin of this substance is obscure, it is also a concentration of all living beings' turbid energies, which embodied the profound mystery of reincarnation and changes.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_WuXing
Text.Desc: A very peculiar essence, invisible and intangible, but truly exist. Can be extracted from ethereal items.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XianDaoJingHua
Text.Desc: Collective term for the products of all kinds of essence in the world being processed with Qi by Golden Core cultivators. Due to the infusion of Qi, these essence are ineffective to Physical cultivators. If one forcefully use these essence to Remold body, it will cause the cultivation progress of the designated body part to nullify due to the Qi repulsion effect, reversing it to its original state.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XianSui
Text.Desc: Essence of the Immortal Body formed by a Golden Core cultivator. The extremely strong effect of this substance will create an intense stimulation in Physical cultivators. It's not known what might happen if one uses it for Remolding.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ShenSui
Text.Desc: Essence of the Divine Body formed by a Shendao cultivator. The extremely strong effect of this substance will create an intense stimulation in Physical cultivators. It's not known what might happen if one uses it for Remolding.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_BaBao
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of universe.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_WanDao
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the creation of cosmos.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_QiQing
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of Yin and Yang.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ZhouTian
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the derivation of time.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanYang
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of beginning and end.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Jian
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of life and death.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_LingYu
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the thriving of beings.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_WanGu
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the nullification of time.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanCi
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the desolation of cosmos.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_QiSha
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the obliteration of beings.

Text.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanYin
Text.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of creation and formation.
